name: Pilgrimage
description: A large number of pilgrims flock to your settlements to celebrate their high holy days or to bask in your kingdom’s faith. If your kingdom does not have at least one shrine, temple, or cathedral, this event does not occur.

criticalSuccess.msg:
Pilgrims visit all of your settlements to engage in acts of worship. Not only do they provide their own food and supplies, but they also bring gifts to your shrines, temples, and cathedrals. @gain1d6Luxuries, @lose1d6Unrest, and reduce one Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @lose1Corruption
  • @lose1Crime
  • @lose1Decay
  • @lose1Strife

success.msg: The pilgrims celebrate their holy days at your settlements, and their good cheer and attitudes prove infectious. @lose1d4Unrest

failure.msg: The pilgrims celebrate their holy days at your settlements, and their good cheer and attitudes prove infectious. @lose1d4Unrest. In addition, the pilgrims put a strain on your kingdom’s resources. @gain1d4ConsumptionNextTurn

criticalFailure.msg: The pilgrims hold their festivals, but their devout displays by a few strident zealots who stay behind stir up controversy with locals of other faiths. @gain1Corruption and @gain1d4ConsumptionNextTurn
